question_text:
Question 1 
 
 
  
[Verbal Ability : Grammar]
 
 
“I have not yet decided, what will I do this evening; I_______ visit a friend”. 
 
(A)  Mite 
 
(B) Would  
 
(C) Might    
(D)  Didn’t 
Ans. (C) 
Sol. 
Given : 
 
“I have not yet decided, what will I do this evening; I 
might
 visit a friend”. 
 
Hence, the correct option is (C).
 
Question 2 
 
[Verbal Ability : Synonyms & Antonyms] 
 
Eject : Insert :: Advance : _______. (By word meaning) 
 
(A) Advent  
(B) Progress   
 
(C) Retreat   
(D)  Loan 
Ans. (C) 
Sol. 
Given : 
 
Eject is related to insert in a special manner as they are opposite in meaning for each other. In the same 
way of relationship advance will be related to retreat, as advance means forward and retreat means 
backward. 
 
Hence, the correct option is (C).
